title: MVPD Flow to Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a MLBALL or Single Team account that is entitled to watch Live MLB games

AND

+ Postseason games are being broadcasted
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user taps on a game with an MVPD sign-in flow

AND

+ The user connects their entitled MLB account to an authorized cable provider
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive a successful navigation back into the MLB App

AND

+ Playback of the selected game will begin without any issues.

title: Canadian User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into an international account that is location-spoofed to Canada
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch a live postseason MVPD-authorized game from the Watch, Scores, Home, Team, and Gameday pages
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will view an international blackout message for Canadian users

title: Archived Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user was blacked out from viewing a live postseason game (Canada-location user)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The game is final and 90 minutes have passed since the game was archived

AND

+ The user attempts to launch the archived game
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Playback will begin and the user is no longer blacked out from viewing the game

title: MLBALL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is located outside of the United States and Canada

AND 

+ The user is signed into an MLBALL entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches a postseason game
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive successful playback

AND

+ The user will not need to log into their MVPD authorized provider

title: Single Team Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is located outside of the United States and Canada

AND 

+ The user is signed into a single-team entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches a postseason game that does or does not feature their entitled single-team
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive successful playback

AND

+ The user will not need to log into their MVPD authorized provider
